tika-vin11t9:1: 1964. Evaṁ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca āgataṁ vinicchayasāraṁ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena dassetvā idāni tadanantarāya bhikkhunivibhaṅgapāḷiyā, tadaṭṭhakathāya ca āgatavinicchayasāraṁ dassetumārabhanto āha ‘‘bhikkhunīna’’ntiādi. Tasmiṁ apīti ettha api-saddo vuttāpekkhāyaṁ. ‘‘Samāsenā’’ti idaṁ ganthavasena saṅkhipanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. ‘‘Kiñcimatta’’nti idaṁ atthavasenāti veditabbaṁ.
